name: GetAzureSignIns
author: @jahamilto
description: Pull all Azure sign ins for a user within the specified amount of time.

configurationItems.name: client_id
configurationItems.description: Client ID/Application ID of Azure AD Registered App

configurationItems.name: client_secret
configurationItems.description: Secret for Azure AD Registered Application

configurationItems.name: lookup_range
configurationItems.description: Check for sign ins in the last X days. Should be between 1 and 31 days.

configurationItems.name: lookup_limit
configurationItems.description: Display no more than this many sign ins.

configurationItems.name: state
configurationItems.description: Expected sign in state (used as a taxonomy when sign ins appear outside of this area).

configurationItems.name: country
configurationItems.description: Expected sign in country or region (used as a taxonomy when sign ins appear outside of this area).
